title: New Etherscan Product
description: Etherscan has released a multichain tool called Blockscan

body.raw:
The team behind Etherscan has lanuch a new product called Blockscan. It is a multichain tool that allows you to query information from multiple chains. 
<Image src="/etherscan.png" width="400" height="275" alt="Etherscan" />
[Here is the twitter annoucement](https://x.com/etherscan/status/1811413541938991609) 
<b/>
[Their website is here](https://blockscan.com/)
